articles.title: Bose's new SoundLink Max has a little handle and big sound - The Verge
articles.description: Bose has announced the $399 SoundLink Max Bluetooth speaker. It’s got stereo sound, powerful bass, an aux input, and a USB-C port for charging your phone.
articles.content:
